name: snakeia
description: A Snake version with an artificial intelligence. This version has many game modes. You can play against the AI, or let it play alone. A Battle Royale mode is also available, this mode sees between 2 and 100 AI fight! Many settings are available to vary the games. A Levels mode (for the player and the AI) is also available, it's a series of level with a particular goal to achieve (get a minimum score, get a score in time, â€¦). Downloadable levels are available.
author: Eliastik
